sn36.15:1.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi, ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn36.15:1.2: “katamā nu kho, bhante, vedanā, katamo vedanāsamudayo, katamo vedanānirodho, katamā vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā?
sn36.15:1.3: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn36.15:1.5: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.15:1.9: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṃ—
sn36.15:1.11: Yaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ vedanāya assādo.
sn36.15:1.12: Yaṃ vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ vedanāya ādīnavo.
sn36.15:1.13: Yo vedanāya chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ vedanāya nissaraṇaṃ.
sn36.15:1.14: Atha kho panānanda, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ nirodho akkhāto.
sn36.15:1.15: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hoti …pe…
sn36.15:1.16: saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca niruddhā honti.
sn36.15:1.17: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti.
sn36.15:1.18: Atha kho panānanda, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ vūpasamo akkhāto.
sn36.15:1.19: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā vūpasantā hoti …pe…
sn36.15:1.20: saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca vūpasantā honti.
sn36.15:1.21: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo vūpasanto hoti, doso vūpasanto hoti, moho vūpasanto hoti.
sn36.15:1.22: Atha kho panānanda, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassaddhi akkhātā.
sn36.15:1.23: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā paṭippassaddhā hoti …pe…
sn36.15:1.28: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.15:1.29: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo paṭippassaddho hoti, doso paṭippassaddho hoti, moho paṭippassaddho hotī”ti.
